slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Win fantastic payout bonuses up to 500x Jackpot & Lucky Number!
Play by guessing the ball that will appear in the spinning cage. There are 24 balls numbered from 1 to 24 in red and black.

slide-2.title: Lucky Numbers
content: The system randomly selects 2 to 12 numbers as Lucky Numbers. Lucky Numbers have a drastic increase in payout above the normal payout, ranging from 30x to 95x your bet amount.

slide-3.title: Jackpot Number
content: The system randomly selects 1 number as the Jackpot Number. This number can significantly increase the payout beyond the Lucky Number Bonus, starting from 100x to 500x your bet.
